english.segment1: My Words Feel So Empty. My Lips Speak In Vain. Your Face Tells A Story. Of Wounds That Still Remain. Stay True To My Heart. Cast Failures To The Wind. I Hate The Way It Feels. To Know I Slipped Again
english.segment2: Tomorrow Holds Another Chance. Not Just To Smile But Make It Real. For What It's Worth I Won't Give Up. For Whats It's Worth I Won't Give Up
english.segment3: I Won't Walk Away. For What It's Worth I Won't Give Up [x3].
